Name: RADIATE
Size: 3 hours of annotated radar data (~44,140 frames, 200K+ objects)

Name: DOTA
Size: ~2 GB (training + validation images and annotations for thousands of instances)

Name: OpenEarthMap‑SAR
Size: ~403 MB (dfc25_track1_test.zip); full dataset likely several GB

Name: SpaceNet6
Size: ~56 GB (450mx450m tiles with associated buildings footprint labels of AOI 11 Rotterdam)

Name: Noisy Drone RF Signal Classification
Size: ~25 GB(6 drone types + 4 controller types + noise class (~8872 noise samples total))

Name: Oxford Radar RobotCar
Size: ~47 TB(radar scans across 280 km of urban driving)
